message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but $140 is a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $135.
